command.script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash set -eu declare -r CATALOG=$1 START_DATE=$2 END_DATE=$3 declare -a days=( ) declare -i total=0 for d in {1..7}; do days[$d]=$RANDOM (( total+=$RANDOM )) done
printf "+------------------------+
" printf "| %22s |
" "$CATALOG sales" printf "+------------------------+
" printf "| start: %14s |
" "${START_DATE%%T*}" printf "| end: %14s |
" "${END_DATE%%T*}" printf "+------------------------+
" printf "| %22s |
" "Weekly total: \$$total" cat <<EOF +------------------------+ | daily breakdown | +------------------------+ | day | sales | +-----+------------------+ EOF for n in ${!days[@]} do printf "| %-4d|%17s |
" "$n" "\$${days[$n]}" done cat <<EOF +-----+------------------+ EOF
